Configuration.Name: L1=L2=8m_central_apx12p5_JM2017
Configuration.SetupScript:
# config.wavelength = 5 # config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 # config.det = 11200 # config.det_offset = 0 # config.srce = 180 # config.guide = 'g3' # config.apx = -98 # config.bs = 2 # config.beamcenterx = 92.03 # config.beamcenterz = 95.29

Warning: it is not recommended to manually drive the attenuator # sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5.0) sics.drive('nvs_speed', 25476) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength', 5.0) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength_spread', 0.1) driveDet(7200, 0) driveEntRotAp(180) driveGuide('g5') sics.drive('apx', -98) selBs(2) sics.set('beamcenterx', 91.87) sics.set('beamcenterz', 95.57)
